author: Henry Y
title: Great Place to Stay in NYC
text: I had a great experience staying at this Residence Inn for 3 nights. The hotel is centrally located and is within walking distance to subway system, shops, restaurants, Central Park, and others. Room was large, nice and clean. Bed was very comfortable. Staffs were helpful and very friendly. The complimentary breakfast was excellent. I would not hestiate to stay here in future NYC visits. Thanks
